glossary: counter for carriages (e.g. in a train)
traditional unit of weight (for gold, silver and drugs), 4-5 monme, 15-19 g
pre-Meiji unit of currency, orig. the value of one ryō of gold
unit of weight under the ritsuryō system, 1/16 kin, 42-43 g
counter for suits of clothing, sets of armor, etc.
